price: Amenipoteza, nikaacha Ukumbusho, baada ya kwisha nijia, na kweli Shet'ani ni khaini kwa mwanaadamu.
arabic: لَّقَدۡ أَضَلَّنِي عَنِ ٱلذِّكۡرِ بَعۡدَ إِذۡ جَآءَنِيۗ وَكَانَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ لِلۡإِنسَٰنِ خَذُولٗا
footnotes: Rafiki huyu amenibaidisha na Ukumbusho, Dhikr, kumkumbuka Mwenyezi Mungu na kuikumbuka Qur'ani baada ya kwisha kuwa ni nyepesi kwangu. Ndio hivi Shetani anavyo mkhini binaadamu, na kumtokomeza kwenye hilaki yake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: laqad aḍallanī ʿani al-dhik'ri baʿda idh jāanī wakāna al-shayṭānu lil'insāni khadhūlan
